name: Rafa's Bizarre Adventure
description:
Rafa's Bizarre Adventure
Story:
Save the earth from an alien invasion! Tale your sword and get into this bizarre adventure, where lots of dangers and misteries await you!
Developer Notes:
This was our first ever game, done as a CFGS Final Project for first year in ENTI_UB. 
It was 2 months of development and we didnt know anything about unity when we started. This was almost 3 years ago, but I posted it now because I wanted it in my profile : ). 
Really proud of how it came out knowing our skill level back then : D
Anyways, if you ever play this, I hope you like it XD
